skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: master hindi numbers
des:
Have you ever scratched your head when some one from a hindi community mentions a number when dealing with money? Have you asked what's the English version of the number mentioned in Hindi? Or do you have tough time negotiating prices while travelling in auto/cabs in North India 
Whether you are in India or abroad, Novice or expert, it does not hurt to revise the hindi number system!! 

Amaze your friends with your new found super power!!
We have specifically recorded short audios for numbers from 0 to 100 with a short pause. The pause enables you to think of the number yourself before we reveal the hindi number. To master any number from 0 to 100., you can repeat them any number of times. The numbers in the 100's and 1000's follow similar pattern. Once you have gained mastery over 0 to 100 numbers it will be easy to master others
Sample Utterances
Invocation:
1. Alexa, Open Master Hindi Numbers
After the welcome message
You can say

2. Alexa, fifty five --- for having 55 in Hindi or 
3 Alexa, get me 77 --- for having an audio of 77 in hindi with a short pause between the english and hindi version OR
4 Alexa, yes, for series of numbers from 0 to 100 with english and hindi versions for about 4 minutes

Welcome to Master Hindi Numbers !! May you attain mastery!!
